> <OLD>
>
> At the Black fortress, Rat Trap quietly skulks into the crevace=
 as he
sniffs the air around him, sitting on his hind legs, looking all aro=
und,
then back to Windlord. He seems uneasy and crouches low.
>
> " I dunno=
 about you Windlord, but I got this strange feeling that we're
definitely b=
e'n watched. We need a signature scrambler pronto, and wheels is
the only o=
ne who's got it. Anyway, until then, we gotta move on, danger or
no danger.=
 Now, I need ta find that little control pannel I found before...
Hmmm, thi=
s ain't familliar, I think we're at the opposite side of the
fortress.. But=
 there's gotta be more than one control pannel box, right?
Think ya might k=
now where ta find it?"

<NEW>

The things inside are indeed very different =
than what Rat Trap had seen
before, it is as if the base had been rebuilt a=
lmost from the ground up,
even the paint job was different, it now being so=
mething akin to the darker
colors that the Decepticons of old preferred.

R=
at Trap=92s small crevasse opened into a hallway. He could see doors at
eit=
her end, both of which had small control panels next to them. There was
als=
o a door near the midpoint of the hall, nearly in front of where Rat Trap
p=
erched, it had a series of symbols on it that read =93Stairs down=94 in
Cyb=
ertronian.

> <OLD>
>
> Without much show of emotion, Tucson narrows
> an o=
ptic, and turns up the frequency on his
> sonar emitter, thus making the si=
gnal much
> stronger, and powerful enough to span over near
> Deepstryke an=
d Phobia, in an attempt to
> disorientate them as well. While doing that, h=
e
> keeps full concentration on Hydras.

<NEW>

 As Tuscon attempts to diso=
rient the new group of approaching soldiers, an
answering wave of energy is=
 felt from Deepstryke, the one looking much like
a floating cannon. While i=
t does not completely counteract the affect of
Tuscon's wave, much of its a=
ffect is lost as they approach.

"ATTACK!" Deepstryke's daunting voice can =
be heard as Phobia and the sweeps
behind him pull into firing range of the =
maximals. And with one a seeming
accord they open fire on them!

> <OLD>
>
=
> Straight Shot appears worried.
>
> "I knew you'd try something like that!=
 Night Shift's right! Rodimus also
told you not ta try and bite off more th=
an you can chew!"
>
> Tucson readies himself for a battle.
>
> " I'll be fi=
ne, don't worry. I didn't get my name for nothing."
>
> Night Shift didn't =
want any part of Tucson throwing himself into the
dragon's lair. He knew wh=
at had to be done, and against Tucson's orders, he
reaches out to Rodimus.
=
>
> "NIGHT SHIFT TA RODIMUS OVER! I THINK YA BETTER SET UP SOME SERIOUS
SEC=
URITY AT THE ARK, 'CAUSE WE'RE GONNA NEED YA HERE! TUCSON'S WAITN' FOR
HYDR=
AS AND HE'S LOOKN' TA GO ONE ON ONE WITH 'EM!"
>

<CUT/PASTE>

>
> Back at =
the Ark, Quickstride shakes his head, as the darkness lifts, and
he can hea=
r and see again. He snorts.
>
> " Talk about a serious system glitch. What =
the pit was that?"
>
> He could now see and hear Rodimus.
>
> "I'm okay Rod=
imus, I - think it was just a glitch, not sure really..
Anyway, someone is =
definitely here, but I'm sure I can handle things here.
You better go assis=
t Night Shift and the others. He said something about -
Tucson waiting for =
Hydras... Sorry, overheard the com, can't help it."

<NEW>

Rodimus nodded =
at Quickstride, =93I don=92t think that was a system glitch.=94 He
bent dow=
n to look at what looked the hilt of some sort of black dagger that
was pro=
truding from the ground, most of the blade being buried as if it had
been t=
hrown. It did not appear to be made of any standard metal, it look
more lik=
e some sort of crystal as it glinted in the sunlight.

=93I don=92t like th=
is.=94 Rodimus said as he reached down to touch it and it
evaporated into w=
hat appeared to be smoke and disappeared. He shook his
head, =93No I don=92=
t like this at all.=94

He stood up and look at Quickstride, =93You are rig=
ht, I have to go, but I
don=92t think that that blade was a coincidence. I =
told you one of those new
ones was a ninja.=94 A worried look went across R=
odimus=92 face, =93I may have
been lured out here on purpose.=94

Keying hi=
s radio Rodimus spoke to Nightshift, =93I hear you Night Shift.=94 That
wor=
ried look on his face still on his face. =93I am on my way.=94

Rodimus loo=
ked at Quickstride as he changed stations, =93Lord Elder, it is up
to you a=
nd Quickstride, I have to go to the battle.=94

Elder=92s gruff voice could=
 be heard, =93Yeah I heard. You be careful now kid.=94

Rodimus nodded, =93=
There might be an intruder in the base, a ninja I think,
keep the sensors o=
n full, this could get ugly before it is over.=94

=93SLAG!=94 Elder said, =
=93That is why you were brought out there.=94

Rodimus nodded as he looked =
at Quickstride, making sure he got the point as
well. =93I am depending on =
you two to keep the others safe.=94 Rodimus couldn=92t
even say the name El=
ita or Nightlight, to do that may have broken his
resolve to leave them.

A=
s if hearing the plea behind his words Elder simply said, =93We got it
Rodi=
mus, you go, go now, they need you!=94

=93Got it!=94 he said. With a last =
look at Quickstride Rodimus straightened and
transformed into a huge futuri=
stic looking truck. However unlike before he
looked different, more like Op=
timus as he did so. He formed a smaller
vehicle, and from out of nowhere a =
trailer assembly connected to him. Fire
seemed to sizzle along his frame as=
 he landed on his wheels and his two
forms connected!

With a burst of powe=
r he revved his engines and began to move towards
Tuscon=92s location. =93I=
 am on my way!=94 he transmitted.

Meanwhile, in response to Hydras' comman=
d several figures left the shuttle
that was flying towards the black tower =
and began to make thier way towards
Tuscon and his team's location: Insecti=
con, Bruticus-X, Iguanus, Skyshadow,
Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, Quick=
strike, Terrorsaur, and Waspinator all
hit the skies!

Inside the shuttle t=
he three remaining troops Fractyl, Tarantulus and
Inferno piloted the shutt=
le in towards the base. The large hanger door on
the tower rumbled and open=
 to let the shuttle enter.

"Sir?" Tarantulus said, "What about the breach =
in the wall? I thought I read
a Maximal signature there?"

 (TAG)

Preston
